description: This file defines application-wide theming for a Flutter project, encapsulated within the AppTheme class. It includes color schemes, theme data configurations for light mode, and a gradient for UI elements. The theme emphasizes a minimalist, modern aesthetic with specific color palettes and transition styles.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: Centralizes application theming, including color palette, theme data configurations, and UI styling consistent with the 'Ocean Professional' style guide.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: A getter that returns a ThemeData object configured with specific colors, typography, and transition styles for a light theme.
